examples.example: 经过努力，我的工作效率提高了一倍，这让我十分开心。

translate.english: Through hard work, my work efficiency has doubled, which makes me very happy.

examples.example: 通过不断学习和实践，他的能力在短时间内提升了一倍，真是太棒了！

translate.english: Through continuous learning and practice, his ability has doubled in a short time. That's really great!

examples.example: 我的运动量比之前增加了一倍，身体也变得越来越健康了。

translate.english: My amount of exercise has doubled compared to before, and my body has also become healthier and healthier.
